BDC_XT_ZSMB_PZ.MBSQL: select (CASE WHEN a.bdcdyfwlx = 1 THEN case when to_char(nvl(a.zdzhmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00')=0 then '房屋建筑面积' || to_char(nvl(a.dzwmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00') || w.MC else '宗地面积' || to_char(nvl(a.zdzhmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00') || w.MC || '/房屋建筑面积' || to_char(nvl(a.dzwmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00') || w.MC end ELSE case when to_char(nvl(a.zdzhmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00')=0 then '房屋建筑面积' || to_char(nvl(a.dzwmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00') || w.MC else '共有宗地面积' || to_char(nvl(a.zdzhmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00') || w.MC || '/房屋建筑面积' || to_char(nvl(a.dzwmj, 0), 'FM99999999999990.00') || w.MC end END) mj,'用途1' as yt,'权力性质1' as qlxz,'2018-222' as syqx from bdc_xm a left join bdc_zd_mjdw w on a.mjdw = w.dm where a.xmid=#{xmid}

BDC_XT_QLQTZK_FJ_PZ.QLQTZKSJY: select dbr,zl from bdc_xm where xmid = #{xmid}
BDC_XT_QLQTZK_FJ_PZ.FJSJY: select dbr,zl from bdc_xm where xmid = #{xmid}
